about_the_game:
Celebrate 20 years of SOULCALIBUR with an all new Character Creation set!

- DLC Introduction -
Additional items for use in Character Creation (42 in total)
These items include the following:
- Crossover items from TEKKEN 7 (10 total)
- Items brought back from SOULCALIBUR: Lost Swords (10 total)
- Items for regular characters (3 total)
- Extra/special items (6 total)
- Other Character Creation items (11 total)
- New voices for custom male and female characters (1 each)
detailed_description:
Celebrate 20 years of SOULCALIBUR with an all new Character Creation set!

- DLC Introduction -
Additional items for use in Character Creation (42 in total)
These items include the following:

- Extra/special items (6 total)
- Other Character Creation items (11 total)
- New voices for custom male and female characters (1 each)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8.1, 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4160 @ 3.60GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard or onboard chipset
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8.1, 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690 3.5 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard or onboard chipset
